name: 4chan Dark Watson
description:
Dark Emma Watson themed 4chan script.

Background only really works for 1280x800 screens. 
If you dont have that resolution, then just replace
"body { background: url(http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/8980/emmaleggingsside22.jpg) no-repeat fixed !important; }"
with
"body { background: #000 !important;}"
